trans-unit.source: Specifies the possible alignments with which the items of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Especifica os possíveis alinhamentos com a qual os itens de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> podem ser exibidos.

trans-unit.source: You control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> layout by choosing one of the members of ToolStripLayoutStyle with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você controla <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>layout escolhendo um dos membros de ToolStripLayoutStyle com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Stack Layouts Stacking is the arranging of items beside each other at both ends of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Pilha Layouts de empilhamento é Organizando itens ao lado de cada um dos outros em ambas as extremidades de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The following list describes the stack layouts.
trans-unit.target: A lista a seguir descreve os layouts de pilha.

trans-unit.source: - StackWithOverflow is the default.
trans-unit.target: -StackWithOverflow é o padrão.

trans-unit.source: This setting causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to alter its layout automatically in accordance with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> property to handle dragging and docking scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Essa configuração faz com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>para alterar seu layout automaticamente de acordo com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A>propriedade tratar arrastando e cenários de encaixe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - VerticalStackWithOverflow renders the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> items beside each other vertically.
trans-unit.target: -VerticalStackWithOverflow renderiza o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>itens ao lado de cada um dos outros verticalmente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - HorizontalStackWithOverflow renders the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> items beside each other horizontally.
trans-unit.target: -HorizontalStackWithOverflow renderiza o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>itens ao lado de cada um dos outros horizontalmente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Other Features of Stack Layouts <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> determines the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to which the item is aligned.
trans-unit.target: Outros recursos da pilha Layouts <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>determina o final do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>ao qual o item é alinhado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: When items do not fit within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, an overflow button automatically appears.
trans-unit.target: Quando itens não se ajustarem dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, um botão de estouro é exibida automaticamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property setting determines whether an item appears in the overflow area always, as needed, or never.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>propriedade determina se um item é exibido na área de excedentes sempre, conforme o necessário ou nunca.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event, you can inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, the overflow <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, or if it is not currently showing at all.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>eventos, você pode inspecionar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A>propriedade para determinar se um item foi colocado na principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, o estouro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, ou se ele não estiver sendo exibido em todos os.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The typical reasons why an item is not displayed are that the item did not fit on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property was set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow>.
trans-unit.target: As razões comuns por que um item não é exibido são que o item não se ajustou no principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>e sua <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>propriedade foi definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Make a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> movable by putting it in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> and setting its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripStyle%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Fazer um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>podem ser movidos, colocando-o em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>e definindo seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripStyle%2A>para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Other Layout Options The other layout options are Flow and Table.
trans-unit.target: Outras opções de Layout as outras opções de layout são fluxo e a tabela.

trans-unit.source: Flow Layout Flow layout is the default for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>.
trans-unit.target: Layout de fluxo de Layout de fluxo é o padrão para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: It is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Ele é semelhante a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: The features of Flow layout are as follows: - All of the features of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> are exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os recursos de layout de fluxo são os seguintes:-todos os recursos de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>são expostas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: You must cast the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings> class to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> class.
trans-unit.target: Você deve converter a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings>classe para uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings>

trans-unit.source: - You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> properties in code to align the items within the row.
trans-unit.target: -Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A>Propriedades em código para alinhar itens dentro da linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>propriedade será ignorada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event, you can inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> or did not fit.
trans-unit.target: -Na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>eventos, você pode inspecionar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A>propriedade para determinar se um item foi colocado na principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>ou não se encaixam.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>

trans-unit.source: - The grip is not rendered, and therefore a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> in Flow layout style in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> cannot be moved.
trans-unit.target: -A alça não é processada e, portanto, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>no estilo de layout de fluxo em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>não pode ser movido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> overflow button is not rendered, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>botão de estouro não é processado, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>é ignorado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Table Layout Table layout is the default for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Layout da tabela de Layout de tabela é o padrão para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>

trans-unit.source: It is similar to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Ele é semelhante a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: The features of Table layout are as follows: - All of the features of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> are exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os recursos de layout de tabela são os seguintes:-todos os recursos de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>são expostas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: You must cast the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings> class to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings> class.
trans-unit.target: Você deve converter a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings>classe para uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings>

trans-unit.source: - You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> properties in code to align the items within the table cell.
trans-unit.target: -Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A>Propriedades em código para alinhar itens dentro da célula de tabela.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>propriedade será ignorada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event, you can inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> or did not fit.
trans-unit.target: -Na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>eventos, você pode inspecionar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A>propriedade para determinar se um item foi colocado na principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>ou não se encaixam.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>

trans-unit.source: - The grip is not rendered, and therefore a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> in Table layout style in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> cannot be moved.
trans-unit.target: -A alça não é processada e, portanto, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>no estilo de layout de tabela em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>não pode ser movido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> overflow button is not rendered, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>botão de estouro não é processado, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>é ignorado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items flow horizontally or vertically as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que os itens de fluem horizontal ou verticalmente conforme necessário.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out horizontally and overflow as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que os itens são dispostos horizontalmente e estouro conforme o necessário.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out automatically.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que os itens são apresentados automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out flush left.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que os itens são apresentados acesso à esquerda.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out vertically, are centered within the control, and overflow as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que os itens são dispostos verticalmente, são centralizadas dentro do controle e estouro conforme o necessário.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
